abstract: Internet-centered programs that compete with the core products of Microsoft are a driver of its bid for Yahoo.
snippet: Internet-centered programs that compete with the core products of Microsoft are a driver of its bid for Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Nearly a quarter-century ago, the mantra “information wants to be free” heralded an era in which news, entertainment and personal communications would flow at no charge over the Internet.

headline.main: Facing Free Software, Microsoft Looks to Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Facing Free Software, Microsoft Looks to Yahoo

abstract: Presentations from Yahoo’s management and its bankers argued that the company was worth more than what Microsoft has offered.
snippet: Presentations from Yahoo’s management and its bankers argued that the company was worth more than what Microsoft has offered.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  A week after Yahoo learned that it would be the target of a $44.6 billion hostile bid by Microsoft, the company’s board met on Friday to consider its options, a person briefed on the meeting said.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Directors Discuss How to Face Microsoft Bid
headline.print_headline: Yahoo’s Directors Discuss How to Face Microsoft Bid

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Miguel Helft

abstract: I leaped up from my desk vowing to commit the most sensational attack of revenge in the history of the personal computer industry.
snippet: I leaped up from my desk vowing to commit the most sensational attack of revenge in the history of the personal computer industry.
lead_paragraph: AT high noon on a recent Monday, I leaped up from my desk vowing to commit the most sensational attack of revenge in the history of the personal computer industry. Just 72 hours earlier, I had taken delivery on a Dell Inspiron 1720 laptop loaded with Microsoft Windows Vista. It was already on the blink. I couldn’t open a Word document. I couldn’t run a Google search. I couldn’t even send e-mail. I vowed to shave Michael Dell and Bill Gates with a broken beer bottle.

headline.main: Sending an S O S for a PC Exorcist
headline.print_headline: Sending An S O S For a PC Exorcist
